item.title: Almost got it
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

public void jfx80(int j, int Y, int X, int time)
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null) 
{
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null"))
{
if(person.distanceToPoint(Y, X) <= 60)
{
person.gfx80(j, Y, X, time);
}
}
}
}
}
    public void gfx80(int j, int Y, int X, int time)
    {
//My spell stuff.
    }

Now when i cast that on someone, it does the gfx on everyone around me :/… I know it’s because of for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {…

Can someone re-write that, so it would work on just enemyX, and enemyY? And not everyone around me.

Many thanks.
